page.title: 12GAMES AT FAIR OAK SCHOOL
page.content: These are some of the games we play at School. {French Skipping.}For this you get a piece of elastic about two metres long and join the ends. Two people stand facing each other with the elastic round their ankles or knees. Someone stands in the centre and jumps over the elastic according to instructions. When you say "on" you jump on the elastic; "inside" and "out" are other calls. If you make a mistake you are out. The height of the elastic is raised each time and all the time you chant-"Granny put her knickers on inside out". {Jew Rush.}To play thi game you need a powerball. The person who is "it" throws the ball over the playground and the others have to run for it. You have to get the ball as many times as there are people playing to win.
